Type Scale Examples

Interactive examples demonstrating typographic scale calculations and visual applications.
About Type Scales: Typographic scales provide harmonious font size relationships using mathematical formulas or traditional harmonic ratios. They ensure consistent visual hierarchy and improve readability across different text sizes.
